Therefore  on 
the  basis  of above  reasoning, 
it 
is  very  clear  that  the  vehicle
should  be  given to  the  genuine owner,  lst  Respondent Chaminda La!.  Therefore

there

Court  Judge.  Accordingly, 
the  order  of  the  Learned  High  Court  Judge 
is
Appeal  is  hereby dismissed without costs.
